title: Spirit Guard Udyr Sound Bugs
body:
SGU emotes are stuck to bear form, no matter what form you're in, and changing forms after phoenix form is maxed will play the phoenix sound, regardless of which form you're on.

The unique interactions with jungle mobs also seem to be bugged and not working

replies.body:
Hi there! 

Thanks for the report! We're currently working on fixes for SGU's audio bugs. :]
